website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design and an attractive canister make this a design piece as well as an effective plunger.
pros: Magnetic collar on canister holds plunger in tight
Flat-top handle lets you get plenty of force
cons: Does not work well on elongated toilet openings

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This plunger is so expensive but after buying 4 other toilet plungers that took 20 minutes or longer to work or simply stopped working at all, I'm not mad at it. Granted, the higher price is probably because of the caddy (which is a nice touch) but even without the caddy I would still pay the price for this. It is the ONLY plunger that has worked with three different types of toilets and will not break down. It's super strong and sturdy and unclogs toilets in less than a couple of minutes! On top of that, it just looks nice. As long as quality stays the same, I will never buy another plunger again.
customer_reviews.author: Rororo

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit shape!
customer_reviews.text: In all aspects except for functionality, this plunger is nice. It's sleek, sits nice in the corner, and is hung nicely in its stand. Now for use...I waited almost a year before I wrote this because I really like to put accurate reviews for the stuff I buy. Listen, best you buy another plunger. The plunger doesn't fit in the toilet to create a seal which you need for plunging. The shape of the rubber doesn't match up with the shape of the toilet. I'm searching for another plunger as we speak. Had to get a snake to unclog the darn toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Mastayugi91

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes in white
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek nice design. I like how the pole Handel is magnetized.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Back to buy one for each bathroom
customer_reviews.text: So my husband finally used this (I didn't ask why) and he says we need to throw out our other plungers and buy more of these. It works good. I am happy since I have believed for years that I am the only person in this family who knows how and when to use a plunger. Thank you, simplehuman! Our older plungers did not make a good deal on the porcelain and the rubber was stiff. These make a good seal and are flexible, while producing a forceful plunge.
customer_reviews.author: Marta SolitaireTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Quality product-it's Simple Human...
customer_reviews.text: I have found all Simple Human products to be quality. This is no exception. It's sturdy and looks good (hey it's a plunger, can't look great) Works very well. Unclogs in seconds! Love that I carry it and the base stays attached (magnetic). Easy to take from room to room with no worries about any dripping etc. I have seen many homes with a plunger just sitting on the floor at the back of their toilet. (Some really nice homes too!) I really appreciate a holder for it that looks good and keeps the germs off my floor.
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly & easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the holder looked like it would more sanitary than most others (holding the plunger in with magnets & covering more of the plunger than my old one). I have not reviewed this yet because I haven't had to use it, but then my daughter "needed" a toilet paper roll to make a craft and decided she would unwrap one herself and flush the entire roll's paper at once. I was really impressed at how quickly it broke up the clog & the toilet water went right down. I was expecting a mess and this plunger made it no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good plunger but does not fit all toilet shapes
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers experienced, this plunger does not fit my newer toilet, so it is not very effective at plunging. My cheap, older plunger worked better because the plunger head was a different shape. I would recommend this plunger if you check that it fits your toilet. I like that there is a magnetic carrying case, and the design is very sleek. I am disappointed that it does not work universally with all toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Esthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I know toilet plungers aren’t exactly the most fashionable item, but I really wanted something that wasn’t ugly to place next to the toilet. This plunger comes with a case/holder so the plunger isn’t actually touching the floor. It also has a sleek black and chrome look to it which matches my bathroom. I think it’s perfect in the corner of the bathroom and doesn’t look terrible!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee. Em.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice and Works As it Should
customer_reviews.text: After a bad experience with the OXO brand plunger, I bought one of these and am very pleased with it. My OXO plunger would turn inside out every time I used it, but this plunger actually works as designed with no issues. It also looks nice. And it has an "open" design that makes it easy to put back on the stand and allows it to thoroughly dry out between usages. I now have two of these and will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: cse-amz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looked nice but it did not unclog my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too small, didn't plunge my toilet, had to buy another plunger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. English

customer_reviews.title: We buy anything by Simple Human
customer_reviews.text: Hands down Simple Human products are well made and last. Yes, they are more expensive then similar products, but did I say, "They are durable and last a long time." These are beautifully designed and constructed. Look so sophisticated in our bathrooms. Easy to clean and durable. We also own other Simple Human products. Their trash cans are the best. Never an odor and work beautifully with our kitchen decor. Thank you, Simple Human. You are more like SUPER Human. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Midtenner

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be giving a review for a toilet plunger. When I wasn’t home someone flush the toilet and water was reaching the top so they turned off the water. When I came home I turned on the water but the toilet was clogged and of course my sturdy rubber plunger had a big crack in it. So I ordered this one. I barely plunged and it cleared whatever the problem was. Easy to do, not the heavy plunging you might have to do with the rubber plunger.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: This puppy has a MUCH better flange design to seal into the base of the toilet bowl/entry to the ejection port (for lack of a better term.) Whereas the previous plunger needed 5-10 pushes to clear most issues, this one rarely needs more than 2, and with less splashing, etc. Just pony up the extra pound for this perfect plunger and I promise, you'll find it was worth it! The magnetic base is super nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jammin' James

customer_reviews.title: LOVE that this is magnetic
customer_reviews.text: So, I know the thing you really were looking forward to was buying a plunger on Amazon because who doesn't love thinking about the reasons that lead up to you having to search for a plunger online for same day or next day delivery...... Anyways, this is a great buy. It's sturdy, comes with a nice little protector, and it's magnetic! That way, when you need to move it around the bathroom, the ittle stand comes with. Your fears of getting unwanted mess everywhere because the plunger went rogue is no longer a concern with this piece of toilet tech. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice design with flaws and for the high cost.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the look of it, the tapered design of the rubber end makes it wobbly when you actually have to use it. In addition, the magetic holder is week, so the caddy and plunger don't hold together well and takes two hands. Could be better especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TWBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Plunger Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This plunger is not too stiff, and works the best if any plunger I've ever used. Quality and functional! I am surprised to see any negative review of this. Its not too stiff, making it hard to get a good seal, or too soft, making it to do the job. It really is just right. That said, you have to know how to plunge properly with the right amount of force, while working it to get the optimal seal. It takes a bit of a knack, but really works much better than any other plunger out there. I was a plumber/ pipefitter for many years, and I know this to be true!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Rick

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy I Made This Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this as it was a need, not a want. I now have to say I would call it a want. It is a bit pricey but gosh does it work. I gave it one push the clog immediately released. This a very well mad product , easy to use and the magnetic holder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Millionaire Plunger
customer_reviews.text: Most elegant toilet plunger I have ever owned. I tried the accordion style but could never find one that sealed well enough to do the job. And each one I tried did nothing but send water flying in all directions. I love everything about this plunger. You can't go wrong with the old reliable design. The only CON is the price but so far it has been worth it. Very sturdy construction and it actually looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Simple Human product! We have always used the traditional plunger that come to find is actually used for sinks. When our regular old plunger broke we did some research and decided on this one. Best plunger decision ever. You need very little force to unclog the toilet which is so nice and the magnetic base keeps the plunger in its holder. This is definitely worth the extra bit of money.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Boo

customer_reviews.title: Major Overkill On Very Difficult to Remove Sticky Wrap Message On Handle
customer_reviews.text: After uselessly scrubbing I had to buy Goo Gone to get the sticker off that wrapped around the base of handle for over an inch all the way around, otherwise it would have had gross stuff attach to it when used in the toilet . Lighten up on the sticky stuff, or better yet, incorporate the "I'm magnetic" message into the high quality mostly blank 6 page card board tag attached with plastic. What a waste of material and my time.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaRT

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well and doesn't rust. Looks good in the bathroom so you don't have to hide it. EDIT: Plunger is now developing some rust spots on the "stainless steel" rod, dropped a star.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 months ago. Never had a reason to try it out till today. So when the toilet started filling up, I hurriedly turned off the water valve. Grabbed my fancy dancy plunger, pushed it down with 3 quick bursts, and BLAM! The water was gurgling down the drain. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Albert

customer_reviews.title: Back-Splash
customer_reviews.text: This plunger does Not get a complete Seal inside the toilet, so when you begin plunging you get “Back Splash”. We thought this plunger would have a flexible extended rubber neck that fit inside the toilet cavity, but it does Not, Rather it has a Rigid rubber neck, & does Not mold to fit the toilet cavity Which prevents a complete Seal.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tool everyone needs in your house. I was a little worried about the price but it’s a product that will last a long time. I love the magnetic grip. The hand is super sturdy and easy to use. The suction power is perfectly designed for most toilets too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my Kohler HET
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description, this did not come even close to sealing my Kohler HET hole. 3 stars because it appears to be of a high quality and it looks great and it probably is perfect for the right toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Price

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the look of this in my bathrooms, especially our guest bathrooms! It is a nessecity obviously and it's nice that it doesnt look cheap or gross just sitting there. It is actually great quality! Read the description, the handle is magnetic to the base (great feature) I bought 2! Will buy another soon! On the spendier side for a plunger. But so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: This plunger simply doesn't work. Both my husband and I will plunge for about 15 mins and it won't clear the toilet. Something is wrong with the design. I love how sleek it looks and the magnetic clip but that's all. It seriously is total junk and made my toilet overflow twice!!! Never again! I wish I had returned it earlier so I could get a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: B.I.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for looks
customer_reviews.text: These plungers aren't just pretty accents that say Simple Human on them. True to the Simple Human norm they are clever. The magnet holds the plunger up so the water drains off and doesn't mold/mildew inside it. The shape is very efficient also. I thought we were really buying these just to round out the rest of the SH things we have in the house but now I'm glad my wife found these. They aren't much more expensive than other nice plungers either so if you want something more than the standard, red rubber and wooden handle plunger, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Why does this rust?
customer_reviews.text: Works but not sure why so much rust build up on the shaft. This should be a high-quality stainless steel product. I did not expect to have to buy stainless steel cleaner and steel wool to clean this thing once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Plunger!
customer_reviews.text: I went to Walmart to got a Clorox brand toilet plunger, it was really soft rubber which splatter water everywhere and didn't work real well. This seems to work pretty well. Quality control could be better as there's fringes of rubber all around that could look cleaner and trimmed for a brand that's know for innovation and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Doan

customer_reviews.title: White suction cup not black
customer_reviews.text: I was looking white suction cup black leaves the streaking marks in the toilet bowl
customer_reviews.author: Sarwat Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it out a whole lot, but I can say it looks a lot better than the plunger I had before. The stand it comes with makes it more worth it than other plungers. It does exactly what it says though, not sure how long it will last though
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this simplehuman toilet plunger after getting a huge blister from using a cheap plunger to remove a clog. This plunger not only looks great but it also works great. I was so impressed by how easily it removes clogs that I purchased another one to give to my sister. This plunger is a bit pricey but it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA MULLERVY

customer_reviews.title: Not Good For Kohler Low Flow Toilets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on Kohler 1.6g and 1.28g low flow toilets. It doesn't seal on these toilets. It is well made and if I had an older toilet I would recommend it. But it doesn't work on modern toilets as advertised and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: flyntie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toilet plunger!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a bit pricey but is well worth it. It works well in terms of suction power, looks good, and the magnetic holder is awesome and prevents me from having to wrap the plunger in a bag or some other make-shift holder.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Good for pushing poo down a pipe.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice looking so you don't have to hide it in a utility closet. Though... It's rather tall. Not short enough to be stored away in a cabinet like our last one. Build quality gets an A+. Don't see this breaking any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shades

customer_reviews.title: It is well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful for a Plunger...I like pretty stuffs. When I search for a Plunger, I want something nice and good product. I understand this could be a little pricey for someone, but I think it worth of the money. It makes your restroom look nice and organized, not gross and yucky!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does not work wuth Toto toilets
customer_reviews.text: Attractive product and great design. Unfortunately, this product does not fit Toto toilets. I didn't find out until I needed it—months later. We
customer_reviews.author: R. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I love how the base sticks to the plunger so you can carry it to other bathrooms if needed without nasty funk or water found anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zentz

customer_reviews.title: Great design but needs more suction
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and magnet feature but the suction wasn’t very strong. Had to spend a lot of time and dish soap on a hard job. Wish the suction was better.
customer_reviews.author: xHaM

customer_reviews.title: BEST plunger ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this plunger. Gets the job done. Nice sturdy stainless steel handle. And a great little container to keep it hidden from view. Uses magnet to attach plunger handle to the cover. Stays put. Seems kind of weird to write a review for a plunger !! but it's night and day from my old crappy wooden one that didn't work and didn't have a cover. (ewww) I am very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this plunger!
customer_reviews.author: julielee

customer_reviews.title: Best-Working Plunger Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally do reviews but I just have to say that I have tried a lot of plungers of varying types and this by far is the best I've ever had. I actually have one for upstairs and one for downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bakie

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well, Attractive Set.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, much more pleasant looking than your standard hardware store fare. Worth the extra cash. Haven't owned it long enough to rate durability, but seems well made. [EDIT] I bumped this up to 5-stars now that I've had it 11 months. Works every time, even on low-flow.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Calling

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: This plunger looks good and feels sturdy. It sits in its storage cover nicely. I've only had to use it a couple of times and it has worked well on each occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great looking plunger. Works great and I love the handle. Very nice and sturdy. I have a small bathroom but it fits fine. I like the magnetic grip so if u need to take it to another room in your house, there is no dripping on the floor and I like that it keeps the plunger from touching the floor and is hidden. You can't go wrong with this one. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mialucy

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product is great looking and functional. I love that it is lined with removeable plastic and you can easily clean it. I also love that it has a magnet which elevates the plunger from sitting directly on the base allowing it to air dry. It also allows you to unscrew the plunger and replace the rubber with a new one. These money saving and SimpleHuman products have been great to me in the past and their reputation continues.
customer_reviews.author: kporche

customer_reviews.title: Really well made Plunger
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Works well as a plunger and the case covers it well and is magnetized to hold it on the plunger when needed. So you can actually pick it up and not have to worry about the plunger leaking anything onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nicer looking plunger and it works well. I like how the plunger hooks onto the case so that I don’t have to touch it while bringing it to different bathrooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I have a stupid water saver toilet that clogs super easy. This plunger looks nice enough to leave in the bathroom and works as well as any plunger I have used.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Shepardson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST plunger I have ever owned-- I've lived in many homes, I had several different plungers. It handles the "business" as well or better than the big ugly ducklings at the hardware store, and it looks much better than the plastic crap-- pardon the expression-- at the discount store. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: How does one keep a plunger on hand without drawing attention to it? THIS product. Slick, clean, discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Looks & Works Great in the Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a set with the 'simplehuman Toilet Brush with Caddy' and it looks and works great! Easy to access and clean the toilet when needed but most importantly, it looks good in the bathroom and is not an eye sore. Definitely worth the money; very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A James

customer_reviews.title: Best plunger
customer_reviews.text: Its really good man , i was just keep trying to pull the toothpaste that was fallen by me nd stuck in the toilet . I just used it for only one time its really pump that nd now its working .. thnks
customer_reviews.author: Suraj

customer_reviews.title: Love this plunger!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice looking and functional plunger for our recently remodeled home - guest & master bath. I started with one for the guest room because nothing is more embarrassing than needing a plunger as a guest and having to ask for one! This plunger has a very clean, minimal design. Looks very nice in the bathroom and works very well in our Kohler Memiors commode. Its predecessor did not work in the Kohler commode. - Overall, the plunger works very well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Robby, Kim and the kids

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I’d spend this much on a plunger or write a review on one. But this does seem to make a better seal, it succeeded where normal and bellows style plungers failed. The magnetic attachment to the drip pan is great too. You won’t regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered in a box that was 3x too big. The metal piece onto that says "simple human" came off and I had to super glue it back on. Amazon please train your people to pack things correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I like it because its functional, strong and very nice looking. It's not the greatest plunger on the planet, but for every now and then, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Phenomenon007

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our high efficiency toilets
customer_reviews.text: We have high efficiency Ove toilets and this didn't work any better than the $10 red rubber plungers. Sad since this one is priced so much higher. The Korky beehive works, would recommend the function of that over the looks of this one.
customer_reviews.author: cindyls

customer_reviews.title: Work's ok if fit over drain
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but you must fit it directly over drain in order to work. Fits good in holder.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes Of Plungers
customer_reviews.text: When you clog the throne after that impromptu extra scoop of Chipotle hot salsa reach for nothing else but this bad boy. For the first time in your life you won’t be shamed for only needing two pumps & done.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio

customer_reviews.title: My toilet has expensive taste.
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say? My toilet had some cash burning a hole in it's pocket... The price was a bit steep for a plunger, but it looks great. We have one other we bought at a big box store a couple years ago and thought it looked okay, but comparatively, it looks like a...well, it doesn't look as good. The magnet holds well, and it plunges. Can't ask it to do much more besides look good, stay out of the way, and plunge when needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cline

customer_reviews.title: BEST plunger
customer_reviews.text: This works great. looks good too. Easy to hold, and designed to work. A great find.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Weitzberg

customer_reviews.title: No better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking design, but it doesn't work any better than any other cheap plunger I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: I like SimpleHuman products because they're usually well designed & durable
customer_reviews.text: I like SimpleHuman products because they're usually well designed & durable. This plunger does what it's supposed to do and looks nice (stainless steel). I bought both this one and the toilet scrubber by the same company. I already have their trash can and plastic bag holder.
customer_reviews.author: Candy21

customer_reviews.title: A... magical and beautiful plunger
customer_reviews.text: This is the only plunger I've ever seen that I would describe as aesthetically pleasing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brantichrist

customer_reviews.title: Very discreet!
customer_reviews.text: Very discreet. Efficient. And doesn’t make your bathroom look tacky like so many plungers do. Love the discreet holder where you can cover the plunger!
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks like jewelry for the bathroom! And it's functional!
customer_reviews.author: karen k

customer_reviews.title: Buy one. Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought it to clear hair from shower drain. Done!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Digit

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best .... Plungers lol
customer_reviews.text: I have one for home and the office and it works very well. I also like the magnetic system and stainless steel design
customer_reviews.author: Karina A.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Plunger is very sturdy and has a sleek, modern look to it.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy to clean, holds plunger in place
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than your super cheap plungers making it easy to store next to the toilet without being an eye sore. Magnetic clip holds the plunger to the storage unit. Easy to clean. Hygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big of an object for something that should not be a centerpiece
customer_reviews.author: S. Teplinsky

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and actually works better than most plungers. The magnetic feature was something I never even knew I needed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: The only plunger you will ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin on this amazing plunger... I haven’t had to use this bad boy but only once. It looks sleek, the magnetic design is flawless, very durable, and it plunges ever so easily. I’d give this plunger 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, plus it’s Simple Human a brand that is always worth the price. I wish they offered more household items for the kitchen and bath. I highly recommend this item, you can’t go wrong with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Was struggling with old fashioned wooden handle one and this was a breeze! Love the magnetic stand!
customer_reviews.author: CKS631

customer_reviews.title: Functional & Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: I have had a variety of plungers over the years. This is by far the best ever with the drip catcher base and magnetic feature. We had to get one of these for each bathroom after we fell in love with the first one we bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It is a good plunger.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to use this thing way too often. But it works and doesn’t look bad.
customer_reviews.author: krista jonas

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and work great
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I am writing a review for a plunger, but it is a really nice one. Compliments the bathroom rather than being an eyesore. Works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So sleek and stylish. Who knew a plunger could be designed as a comforting aesthetic to the eye. Works well. Drip free as promised.
customer_reviews.author: JenAG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Good looking toilet bowl cleaner that looks modern in the bathroom. Works much better than any other I’ve tried. Simplehuman always makes a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN MCPHERSON

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in the bathroom and keeps the yuckies contained. Got this brand because zi read you can get replacement pluger part for it. Handle seems strong and it will last as will the base.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well build and bought 2 one for each bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Stormtracker

customer_reviews.title: i have been trying to get it not to stink ...
customer_reviews.text: i have been trying to get it not to stink and it still makes me sick i want to return it but too late i guess no option on amazon to return it. I very mad out 29.00
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cook

customer_reviews.title: Hides the business while doing its job!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have the horrible looking black plunger out of the bathroom! This one looks much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's a plunger.  It plunges.
customer_reviews.text: It's works great. It looks sharp. What more do you need to know. If you need a nice looking plunger that plunges - go for it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Krisi

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works quickly and with very little effort, it also looks great! Not your typical eye sore plunger!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Facer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great look. But love even more the magnetic, hold-in-place function. It says you can carry to other toilets while still in holder to minimize dripping, which I haven't tried yet but I think the magnetic feature holding it in the base is a great feature. Doesn't fall out when knocked while cleaning. Stylish appearance, too. Got the matching toilet brush as well and very happy with the set
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my neighbor, since I had one she wanted one too. She loves it because it is concealed, not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, can come loose though
customer_reviews.text: "Attractive" as a toilet plunger, definitely looks better than the average plunger. The stick can come loose from the actual plunging apparatus so exercise caution during use.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking plunger... (if thats possible)
customer_reviews.text: Great magnetic collar. Thankfully I haven't needed to use it yet, but it feels like a quality product. It also looks great in my bathroom with the match toilet brush.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Renn

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fancy plunger
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a plunger, works like a plunger and smells like a plunger. It’s a plunger. It looks fancier than other plungers but if aesthetics are your thing then this is a yes.
customer_reviews.author: David 💜 Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sylish
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and sylish. I dont like plungers but having a nice one makes it better.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: Works with no effort! So much better than my old one. I was a bit concerned about a review that stated the plunger had a rubber tire odor that permeated the whole house, however, this one does not! No problems whatsoever!! Would recommend this product without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: LRM53

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works very good or should I say it does suck! It looks good too instead of that ugly red rubber plunger with the wood handle
customer_reviews.author: JanLynn

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: After using a crappy old school rubber one for years, this is life changing. I get clogs out in five seconds with minimal splashing, what used to take ten minutes and would drench the whole bathroom with splashes. The no drip system and magnetic latch is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McAferty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look very nice in the restrooms at church, better than the old tacky black ones with no caddy
customer_reviews.author: Dee G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in the bathroom. Love the fact that it stays put and doesn't fall all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Loooove It
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! Not only is it handy and keeps the yucky plunger off the floor but it's also sleek and sharp looking instead of having one of those hideous wooden handled black plungers sitting by the toilet. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kritikal Kasper

product_meta.title: simplehuman Toilet Plunger and Caddy Stainless Steel, Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Toilet Plunger| Color:BlackThe simplehuman plunger has a unique magnetic collar secures the cover to the plunger so you can carry them together — without a single drip hitting the floor. The dome-shaped cover discreetly hides it, while the large opening at the back makes it easy to detach. The plunger's flange is specially designed with a narrow profile to work more efficiently with modern toilets.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 5-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
DRIP-FREE DESIGN - A unique magnetic collar secures the cover to the plunger’s stainless-steel rod so you can pick them up and carry them together—without drips.
EASY TO ATTACH - The cover’s large opening makes the plunger easy to detach. It also hides the plunger discreetly out of sight when not in use.
EFFICIENT PLUNGING - The plunger flange has a long and narrow profile specially designed to work more efficiently with modern toilets.
STAINLESS STEEL ROD - Durable, high-quality stainless steel rod stands up to vigorous use.
